formValidations.minlength1: The field must have at least 1 characters
formValidations.minlength2Dates: You must enter a valid date period
formValidations.minlength6: The field must have at least 6 characters
formValidations.minlength9: The field must have at least 9 characters
formValidations.maxlength10: The field must have a maximum of 10 characters
formValidations.maxlength12: The field must have a maximum of 12 characters
formValidations.signUpPasswordLength: The password must have a minimum length of 6 and a maximum of 12 characters
formValidations.onlyCharacters: The field must contain only letters
formValidations.onlyNumbers: The field must contain only numbers
formValidations.onlyNumbersAndLetters: The field must contain only numbers and letters

formValidations.couponOnlyOneOfThisType: You can only apply one coupon of this type

alert.confirmAction: Are you sure to perform this action?

temporalToken.alertMessage: Before continuing, the code of ({{tokenLong}}) digits sent to the address {{email}} is necessary, please enter it below:

signUp.checkTermsAndConditions: By registering you are accepting the personal data processing policies.
signUp.successfulRegistrationMessage: You can now continue with the purchase process.

dashboard.title: Start your purchase to live the WLDC experience
dashboard.subTitle: Select the option you want to get

hotelAndEvent.title: Hotel and event
hotelAndEvent.include: Accommodation at the official WLDC hotel with access to all events on the day that the hotel was purchased + buffet breakfast.
hotelAndEvent.notInclude: Gala dinner on Friday, February 9th, 2024, competition categories, lunches and dinners, airfare and transfers.
hotelAndEvent.wantButton: I WANT THE HOTEL AND THE EVENT!

fullPass.title: Full Pass
fullPass.include: Access to all activities from February 5th to 11th such as: concerts, parties, workshops, conferences, competition, Grand Finale, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, pool parties, beaches and gym.
fullPass.notInclude: VIP pool parties, gala dinner, special bootcamps with international teachers, competition categories.
fullPass.important: All competitors must have the Full Pass to access the event.

passPerDay.title: Pass per day
passPerDay.notInclude: VIP pool parties, gala dinner, special bootcamps with international teachers, categories to compete.

weekendPass.title: Weekend Pass
weekendPass.include: Access to all activities from February 9th to 11th such as: concerts, parties, workshops, conferences, competition, Grand Finale, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, pool parties, beaches and gym.
weekendPass.notInclude: VIP pool parties, gala dinner, special bootcamps with international teachers, competition categories.

categoryPass.title: Category Pass
categoryPass.include: The right to compete in 1 (one) category.

room.include: Buffet breakfast, access to all wldc events on the day you purchased - with the purchase of saturday night, the access to the sunday event will be included.
room.notInclude: The gala dinner on February 9th, competition categories, and dinners.

hotelAndEvent.completeTheFieldsToSearchForRooms: Complete the fields to search for rooms
hotelAndEvent.chooseTheDatesOfYourStay: Choose the dates of your stay
hotelAndEvent.indicatesTheNumberOfPeopleInTheRoom: Indicates the number of people in the room
hotelAndEvent.availableRoomsWillBeShownHere: Available rooms will be shown here

notification.noRecognizeActivity: If you do not recognize this activity, no further action is required.
notification.noRequestCode: If you did not request this code, no further action is required.

temporalToken.subject: Temporal Token {{code}} WLDC Cartagena 2024
body: Hi again!
This code is necessary to continue with your operation:
This code will expire in {{time}} {{unit}} or upon canceling the transaction

signUp.subject: Welcome to WLDC Cartagena 2024 {{names}}
body: Welcome to the WLDC Cartagena 2024 application!
We are very happy to have your presence at the WLDC 2024 edition.
In the application you can purchase the packages to attend this great WLDC 2024 experience in Cartagena Colombia.

purchaseInfo.subject: Order {{orderId}} of WLDC Cartagena 2024
purchaseInfo.button: Click to see the details of your order!
body: Welcome to WLDC 2024!
We want to extend our official welcome to the World Latin Dance Cup 2024. We're getting closer to experiencing the most important Latin Dance event in the world!
It's a pleasure for us to have you as part of this great family.
First and foremost, we want to ensure you have all the information you need...
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Our support team is here to assist you through our social medias.
Reach out to us at:
P.S. Get ready... WLDC 2024 is going to be amazing.

bankTransfer.subject: You are just one step away from the WLDC in Cartagena!
body: We are almost ready to experience the world's largest Latin dance event together. To secure your spot, please make the corresponding payment to:
Beneficiary Name
Account No.
NIT
Swift Code
Total
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Our support team is here to assist you.
Reach out to us at:
